CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 26 reads: " Thousands Thrilled at Courier Home Service Fair...5. The Norge Electric Appliances, used exclusively on the stage were also displayed in a booth through the courtesy of The Home Supply Company and Thomas Electric Appliances. Shown here are Mr. and Mrs. Maurice Linden of Home Supply, Jack Flansbaum, Mr. Thomas of Thomas Electric and two representatives...Harris Photos"
TitMainTitle: Mr. and Mrs. Maurice Linden, Jack Flansbaum, Mr. Thomas, and unknown man standing in Norge Appliances booth in the Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
